name: Alien Invasion (itch) (Minhly)
description:
The game is a 5-7 players game base on a point system, each player will start with 4 points and whoever gets to 12 points is victorious and loses if reach 0 points. One player will be the Out-think Machine and will try to stop all humans from reaching 12 points. Human wins when 2 players reach 12 points and the Out-think Machine wins when 2 players reach 0 points. Each round, humans place down the card they want to play, then the Out-think machine chooses who they want to use their card on by placing their card facing the human card.

https://playingcards.io/gcnmac
